render_info.source_dynamic: select pa.Name as TenToChuc , agt.TypeName as LoaiToChuc , pa.EstablishedDTG as NgayThanhLap , pa.Email as Email , pa.Phone as DienThoai , pa.Agency as CoQuanChuQuan , pa.Fax as FAX , pa.Address as DiaChi , pa.Rate as DanhGia , case pa.RelationshipWithMB when 1 then N'Nồng ấm' when 2 then N'Thiết lập' when 3 then N'Hiểu biết' when 4 then N'Thân thiết' else '' end as MucDoQuanHe , pa.Note as GhiChu , (select count(1) from agency_PressAgencyHR hr where hr.PressAgencyID = pa.PressAgencyID and hr.Deleted = 0) as TongSoNhanSu from AgencyType agt left join agency_PressAgency pa on agt.Id = pa.Type where pa.Deleted = 0 and pa.Type is not null
